            <string language="fr">Magma dans une couche de calcaire</string>
            <string language="en">Magma in a layer of limestone</string>

            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre du magma qui s'est enfoncé dans une couche de calcaire.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows some magma that has pushed its way into a layer of limestone.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt etwas Magma, das seine 
Methode in eine Schicht Kalkstein gedrückt hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra algum magma que

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un certo magma che ha
